name: Duck Island
description:
Duck Island

A little adventure game.

You are a duck, but you want to be a phoenix.

Controls:

Move with ASDW or Arrows, the rest will be displayed during the game.

We, Saturn91 and EinsteinsErbe, had great fun desinging this one! We hope you enjoy the game as well as we did while programming it.

Thanks for playing, please check out:

  • Saturn91's Blog
  • EinsteinsErbe's Blog
